entry.title: WEATHER ADVISORY , White River
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 4:25 PM EST Tuesday 27 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snowshower, -5.6°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Wawa Airport 6:54 PM EST Tuesday 27 December 2022
Condition: Light Snowshower
Temperature: -5.6°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.9 kPa falling
Visibility: 1.2 km
Humidity: 93 %
Wind Chill: -10
Dewpoint: -6.6°C
Wind: S 10 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Tuesday night: Snow at times heavy. Temperature steady near minus 7.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy ending late this evening then cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Amount 5 cm. Wind south 20 km/h becoming light early this evening. Temperature steady near minus 7. Wind chill minus 14 this evening and minus 9 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Tuesday 27 December 2022

entry.title: Wednesday: Periods of light snow mixed with ice pellets. High minus 2.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow becoming mixed with ice pellets early in the afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 2. Wind chill minus 12 in the morning and minus 6 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Tuesday 27 December 2022

entry.title: Wednesday night: Periods of light snow mixed with ice pellets. Temperature steady near minus 2. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of light snow or ice pellets. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 2. Wind chill minus 6 in the evening. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Tuesday 27 December 2022
